title.narrative: West and Central Africa Air Transport Safety & Security Project - APL Phase 2

description.narrative: a) Improve Civil Aviation Authorities' (CAAs) compliance with International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) safety standards, b)Increase CAA's compliance with ICAO's security standards, and c) Enhance main international airports' compliance with ICAO's security standards.
